alert.note: Alert for Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 6:01PM EDT until May 21 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ERIE COUNTY... At 601 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Corry, or 23 miles southeast of Erie, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Corry, Wattsburg and Elgin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
